00044     public function form($name, $attribs = null, $content = false)
00045     {
00046         $info = $this->_getInfo($name, $content, $attribs);
00047         extract($info);
00048 
00049         if (!empty($id)) {
00050             $id = ' id="' . $this->view->escape($id) . '"';
00051         } else {
00052             $id = '';
00053         }
00054 
00055         if (array_key_exists('id', $attribs) && empty($attribs['id'])) {
00056             unset($attribs['id']);
00057         }
00058

00060                . $id
00061                . $this->_htmlAttribs($attribs)
00062                . '>';
00063 
00064         if (false !== $content) {
00065             $xhtml .= $content
00066                    .  '</form>';
00067         }
00068 
00069         return $xhtml;
00070     }
